#summary Repetition block

=Loop=

Is like "While" and "For" in others languages. In CajuScript only "While". But an variable can be used to do like "For".

===While===
{{{
    x = 0
        x < 10 & x >= 0 @
        System.out.println(x)
        x += 1
    @
}}}

===For===
{{{
    x = 0
    x < 10 @
        System.out.println(x)
        x += 1
    @
}}}
